00001 //  MeCab -- Yet Another Part-of-Speech and Morphological Analyzer
00002 //

00007 #ifndef MECAB_CHARACTER_CATEGORY_H
00008 #define MECAB_CHARACTER_CATEGORY_H
00009 
00010 #include "ucs.h"
00011 #include "utils.h"
00012 
00013 namespace MeCab {
00014 class Param;
00015 template <class T> class Mmap;
00016 
00017 struct CharInfo {
00018   unsigned int type:         18;
00019   unsigned int default_type: 8;
00020   unsigned int length:       4;
00021   unsigned int group:        1;
00022   unsigned int invoke:       1;
00023   bool isKindOf(CharInfo c) { return type & c.type; }
00024 };
00025 
00026 class CharProperty {
00027  private:
00028   MeCab::Mmap<char>         *cmmap_;
00029   std::vector<const char *>  clist_;
00030   const CharInfo            *map_;
00031   int                        charset_;
00032   whatlog                    what_;
00033 
00034  public:
00035   bool open(const Param &);
00036   bool open(const char*);
00037   void close();
00038   size_t size() const;
00039   void set_charset(const char *charset);
00040   int id(const char *) const;
00041   const char *name(size_t i) const;
00042   const char *what() { return what_.str(); }
00043 
00044   inline const char *seekToOtherType(const char *begin, const char *end,
00045                                      CharInfo c, CharInfo *fail,
00046                                      size_t *mblen, size_t *clen) const {
00047     register const char *p =  begin;
00048     *clen = 0;
00049     while (p != end && c.isKindOf(*fail = getCharInfo(p, end, mblen))) {
00050       p += *mblen;
00051       ++(*clen);
00052       c = *fail;
00053     }
00054     return p;
00055   }
00056 
00057   inline CharInfo getCharInfo(const char *begin,
00058                               const char *end,
00059                               size_t *mblen) const {
00060     unsigned short int t = 0;
00061 #ifndef MECAB_USE_UTF8_ONLY
00062     switch (charset_) {
00063       case EUC_JP:  t = euc_to_ucs2(begin, end, mblen); break;
00064       case CP932:   t = cp932_to_ucs2(begin, end, mblen); break;
00065       case UTF8:    t = utf8_to_ucs2(begin, end, mblen); break;
00066       case UTF16:   t = utf16_to_ucs2(begin, end, mblen); break;
00067       case UTF16LE: t = utf16le_to_ucs2(begin, end, mblen); break;
00068       case UTF16BE: t = utf16be_to_ucs2(begin, end, mblen); break;
00069       case ASCII:   t = ascii_to_ucs2(begin, end, mblen); break;
00070       default:      t = utf8_to_ucs2(begin, end, mblen); break;
00071     }
00072 #else
00073     switch (charset_) {
00074       case UTF8:    t = utf8_to_ucs2(begin, end, mblen); break;
00075       case UTF16:   t = utf16_to_ucs2(begin, end, mblen); break;
00076       case UTF16LE: t = utf16le_to_ucs2(begin, end, mblen); break;
00077       case UTF16BE: t = utf16be_to_ucs2(begin, end, mblen); break;
00078       default:      t = utf8_to_ucs2(begin, end, mblen); break;
00079     }
00080 #endif
00081     return map_[t];
00082   }
00083 
00084   inline CharInfo getCharInfo(size_t id) const { return map_[id]; }
00085 
00086   static bool compile(const char *, const char *, const char*);
00087 
00088   explicit CharProperty(): cmmap_(0), map_(0), charset_(0) {}
00089   virtual ~CharProperty() { this->close(); }
00090 };
00091 }
00092 #endif
